comments: This teacher is very flexable with grades and will help you if you ask for it. He is a cool old guy but gets off topic sometimes. We watched a few videos every now and then in class. I wouldn\'t recommend taking this class in the early morning but overall if you show up its an easy class to pass

He likes to go off on bunny trails quite often. wrote a college research paper about the movie Cars for History and got an A? i found this course to be an easy A, however, not very deep as far as history goes. very nice guy- like a grandpa tho

He is so BORING. Gets off topic extremely easy. Allows students to distract him from is lecture. Major pushover when it comes to assignments. 3/4- 1/2 of our class never came except for test days. I dont think I learned anything new in his class. I spend so much money on books and he never even had us open them, when he said they were mandatory.
Mr. French is a really nice guy and a good teahcre. It is an easy classs to pass and you learn more about his history than than the one your sapposed to be learning. Good guy though.

French was hired to teach eastern history while Ingle was on maternity leave because his daughter went to China once. He has no business being in a classroom. Sweet guy, but a total pushover, gets off topic a LOT, and was very unclear about his expectations and his criteria changed constantly. Didn\'t get the real syllabus til 3 weeks into class.
